item.description:
BACA has cancelled tonight's performance due to the lockdown in Watertown.   It will be rescheduled at a later date.

 

 

 

 

LIVE! All weekend long. The best and most enthusiastic of Boston Cabaret.

BACA's annual celebration in song!
A glittering musical showcase of professional and aspiring singers.

April 19-21, 2013
First Parish Church, 35 Church St., Watertown Square

Plenty of parking; refreshments available.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Tickets available online, or at the door if available.
$60 Weekend FestPass
$15 per show general admission
$12 per show BACA members
$10 per show seniors and students

Friday, April 19, 8:00pm, accompanist Bill Duffy
Leni Webber - Lover Man Where Can You Be
Prudence Humphreys - Movies and Memories
Casey Thomas - Inevitably New Orleans
Phil Kassel - Pop Music Across Generations
Stephen Smith - American Songbook through the Decades
item.name: Postponed - Cabaret Fest 2013 - sponsored by the Boston Ass'n of Cabaret Artists
